summary: SaveSwitch interface gives you 9 Skyrim game save "banks" to choose from.
descriptionHtml:
SaveSwitch interface gives you 9 Skyrim game save "banks" to choose from.
Easily switch around Skyrim save folders with this standalone program.
Great for multiple players or multiple Skyrim game play saves.

Why was it made ?

I wanted a way to easily have extra game save "banks" (aka Skyrim save folders). I downloaded a few programs and was shocked
to see how they were made. Huge redundant file copy and delete scripts. Very scary stuff! Sadly they didn't even work. So ...

How does it work ?

Instead of copying and deleting files around SaveSwitch simply moves and renames a few folders. When you select a
game "bank" from the interface it simply moves the two folders around. Never touching your game save files themselves.
Well it actually puts the current folder away then moves the one selected as the games normal default save folder. 

Installing ...
When you run the executable it will move itself to the Documents\My Games\Skyrim folder and
leave a shortcut on the desktop, create a new folder called Save, add 8 game save folders to it.
Then you can run SaveSwitch from the created shortcut. (move shortcut wherever you like)

9 save folders total ...
One is the games normal save folder at: Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves. 
The other 8 are a within a folder named Save at: Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Save.

Program is freeware use at your own risk.
Please leave any comments/suggestions you may have.
author: NexusComa
